meanings.definition: Eight times as great or as numerous.
meanings.sent1: The elephant was eightfold larger than the mouse.
meanings.sent2: The eightfold increase in sales was a pleasant surprise.
meanings.sent3: The eightfold mountain of laundry seemed never-ending.
meanings.sent4: The eightfold growth of the city was visible from miles away.
meanings.sent5: The eightfold rainbow stretched across the sky in vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: Consisting of eight parts or members.
meanings.sent1: The octagon is an eightfold shape with eight sides.
meanings.sent2: The eightfold puzzle required assembling eight pieces.
meanings.sent3: The eightfold team worked together to complete the project.
meanings.sent4: The eightfold necklace had eight beautiful gemstones.
meanings.sent5: The eightfold flower had petals in all directions, like a starburst.

meanings.sent1: She ran eightfold faster than her brother in the race.
meanings.sent2: The car sped eightfold down the highway.
meanings.sent3: The music blared eightfold louder than before.
meanings.sent4: The excitement grew eightfold as the event approached.
meanings.sent5: The laughter echoed eightfold through the empty hallways.
